  • My trip to London

    07 Dec 2016

    I absolutly wanted to visit the UK with my wife, especially London because it’s the capital of the England. To travel there, I took the train called Eurostar, in a few hours I was there for the first time! I was so impressed to be in London, this was my dream. When I took the underground, I was completely lost because it’s totally different from the Paris’ one. On...
